description:
No matter the continent, get your bases tunes with this versatile wax iron. Find the right voltage for the place you're in via a simple switch and the appropriate plug adaptor. Features inclide a blue LED that lights when heating, thermostat control for fine-tuned adjustments and a super-tech heating element that provides constant heat and even distribution.

  • Voltage settings range from 100-127V or 220-240V
  • Blue LED indicates heating, then turns off when desired temperature is reached
  • Temperature range is 70-190°C
  • Patended heating element for even distribution and constant heat
  • Ergonomic handle accommodates lefties and righties
  • Packable cord loops neatly for compact stowing
name: Tools4Boards Global Dual Voltage Wax Iron
